Visibility: 8.1 km

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
